org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram

Interface ILinkRouteBuilder.Target

  • Enclosing interface:
    ILinkRouteBuilder

    public static interface ILinkRouteBuilder.Target
    ILinkRouteBuilder at target anchor state.

    Choose a target anchor to get further.

    Since:
    5.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILinkRouteBuilder.BendPoints setTargetAnchor(LinkAnchorFace face, int numerator, int denominator, boolean sliding)
      Request to anchor the connection target point on at a fraction of a given face.
      ILinkRouteBuilder.BendPoints setTargetAnchor(Point loc, boolean sliding)
      Request to anchor the connection target point at a given location.
      ILinkRouteBuilder.BendPoints setTargetAnchorFaceSource(boolean sliding)
      Request to anchor the connection target point on the nearest face toward source node.

    • Method Detail

      • setTargetAnchor

        ILinkRouteBuilder.BendPoints setTargetAnchor(Point loc,
                                             boolean sliding)
        Request to anchor the connection target point at a given location.

        The real anchor location may be different from the requested one.

        Parameters:
        loc - the point location
        sliding - true to request a sliding anchor, false to request a fixed anchor.
        Returns:
        the route builder to use for next steps.

      • setTargetAnchorFaceSource

        ILinkRouteBuilder.BendPoints setTargetAnchorFaceSource(boolean sliding)
        Request to anchor the connection target point on the nearest face toward source node.
        Parameters:
        sliding - true to request a sliding anchor, false to request a fixed anchor.
        Returns:
        the route builder to use for next steps.

      • setTargetAnchor

        ILinkRouteBuilder.BendPoints setTargetAnchor(LinkAnchorFace face,
                                             int numerator,
                                             int denominator,
                                             boolean sliding)
        Request to anchor the connection target point on at a fraction of a given face.

        Depending on the face the fraction starts on the left or from the top.

        The real anchor location may be different from the requested one.

        Parameters:
        face - the desired false
        numerator - the fraction numerator. 0 means top or left, 'denominator' means bottom or right.
        denominator - the fraction denominator.
        sliding - true to request a sliding anchor, false to request a fixed anchor.
        Returns:
        the route builder to use for next steps.
